description: It's unbelieveably quiet here, you take caution with every step...
The light no longer pierces through the leaves, you vanish in the shadows and move blindly...
You enter a cave mouth of impenetrable blackness. As you step in you watch your shadow dissolve into the surrounding darkness...
You see a river flowing; flowing like it didn't notice you - carelessly, free...
The noise around makes you feel uneasy, yet you step into the city to rest...
